description: Disassociates the specified users from the specified stacks.

parameters.name: UserStackAssociations
parameters.description: The list of UserStackAssociation objects. (dict) --- Describes a user in the user pool and the associated stack. StackName (string) --- The name of the stack that is associated with the user. UserName (string) --- The email address of the user who is associated with the stack. AuthenticationType (string) --- The authentication type for the user. SendEmailNotification (boolean) --- Specifies whether a welcome email is sent to a user after the user is created in the user pool.

nested_items.name: UserStackAssociation
nested_items.description: Information about the user and associated stack.

nested_items.name: StackName
nested_items.description: The name of the stack that is associated with the user.

nested_items.name: UserName
nested_items.description: The email address of the user who is associated with the stack.

nested_items.name: AuthenticationType
nested_items.description: The authentication type for the user.

nested_items.name: SendEmailNotification
nested_items.description: Specifies whether a welcome email is sent to a user after the user is created in the user pool.

nested_items.name: ErrorCode
nested_items.description: The error code for the error that is returned when a user can't be associated with or disassociated from a stack.

nested_items.name: ErrorMessage
nested_items.description: The error message for the error that is returned when a user can't be associated with or disassociated from a stack.
